title: Provides for daycare reimbursement by the state within thirty days of an invoice being issued
summary: Provides for daycare reimbursement by the state within thirty days of an invoice being issued.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

           S. 815                                                    A. 516

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                             S E N A T E - A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       IN SENATE -- Introduced by Sen. LAVALLE -- read twice and ordered print-
         ed,  and when printed to be committed to the Committee on Children and
         Families

       IN ASSEMBLY -- Introduced by M. of A. THIELE, LIFTON --  read  once  and
         referred to the Committee on Social Services

       AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to state reimburse-
         ment to certain day care centers

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Paragraph (b) of subdivision 2  of  section  410-c  of  the
    2  social  services  law,  as added by chapter 1014 of the laws of 1969 and
    3  such section as renumbered by chapter  640  of  the  laws  of  1971,  is
    4  amended to read as follows:
    5    (b)  When  certified  by  the department, state reimbursement shall be
    6  paid from the state treasury upon the audit and  warrant  of  the  comp-
    7  troller  out  of  funds made available therefor WITHIN THIRTY DAYS OF AN
    8  INVOICE BEING SUBMITTED TO THE STATE.
    9    S 2. This act shall take effect on the one hundred eightieth day after
   10  it shall have become a law; provided, however, that effective immediate-
   11  ly, the addition, amendment and/or repeal  of  any  rule  or  regulation
   12  necessary  for  the implementation of this act on its effective date are
   13  authorized and directed to be made  and  completed  on  or  before  such
   14  effective date.



        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03742-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to state reimbursement to certain day care centers
